text: Sly Cooper is the titular protagonist of the video game series of the same name. He is voiced by Kevin Miller in all of his appearances. ==Biography== Sly Cooper was raised by his father, Conner Cooper who taught him about his thieving heritage from the book called the Thievius Raccoonus. On a night he was supposed to keep the book, a group of villains known as the Fiendish Five, lead by Clockwerk killed Conner and kept the book. Sly was sent to an orphanage and met a smart turtle named Bentley and a hippo named Murray. ==Personality== Sly is suave, hip and likable at the same time. Category:Sly Cooper Category:Fictional mammals Category:Fictional characters introduced in 2002 Category:Video game protagonists
title: Sly Cooper (character)
